item.title: AAP Recs Buck CDC, Stick to 18 Childhood Vaccines
item.description: The guidance differs from the CDC’s newly recommended schedule, but not from the society’s previous recommendations. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Hemophilia B Gene Therapy Continues to Reduce Bleeding
item.description: Researchers complete final analysis of a phase 3 study of men with hemophilia B receiving intravenous etranacogene dezaparvovec. Medscape Medical News

item.title: SGLT2 Inhibitors Linked to Lower Neuropathy Risk
item.description: Danish national registry data suggest adults with type 2 diabetes taking SGLT2 inhibitors have a slightly lower risk of developing diabetic foot probl...

item.title: Scientists Sniff Out Compelling New Treatments for Anosmia
item.description: Olfactory training, platelet-rich plasma, electrical stimulation, and more: Here’s where the research stands on smell recovery. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Early Vaccine Delays Raise the Risk for Missed MMR Dose
item.description: Delays in standard 2- and 4-month vaccinations among children with regular access to care significantly increase the odds of missing the measles, mump...
